news.title: Oasis Live '25 pop-up shop opens in Dublin ahead of sold-out Croke Park shows
news.summary: Located at 133 St. Stephen's Green, the shop will be open until August 17.

news.title: Oasis “shocked and saddened” after man dies following Wembley Stadium fall
news.summary: "Oasis would like to extend our sincere condolences to the family and friends of the person involved," said Oasis.

news.title: Dolly Parton awarded Guinness World Records icon status
news.summary: "To say I’m humbled by that would be an understatement. I take a lot of pride in it and I’m very humbled by it,” said the Jolene singer of her latest title.
